content.text: Match ends, Hércules 0, Barcelona 3.
Second Half ends, Hércules 0, Barcelona 3.
David Cortés (Hércules) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Nolito (Barcelona).
Substitution, Barcelona. Ibrahim Afellay replaces Andrés Iniesta.
Goal!  Hércules 0, Barcelona 3. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Dani Alves with a cross.
Substitution, Barcelona. Seydou Keita replaces Xavi.
Substitution, Barcelona. Nolito replaces David Villa.
Goal!  Hércules 0, Barcelona 2. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Dani Alves.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Pedro.
Second yellow card to Farinós (Hércules) for a bad foul.
